name: Ms Susan C
discription: Sales staff spent time explaining the camera and he did not think that any question we asked was silly.

name: Mr Gordon B
discription: I very much appreciated the expertise and knowledge of the staff concerning the camera I selected and the cheerful and patient way they shared their knowledge with me.

name: Mr Ian M
discription: Knowledge of the product range friendly service gave me some alternatives and not pushy

name: Mr Liam M
discription: Trevor was very helpfull and knowledge. As a newcomer to SLR cameras he advised me on what I should consider. We are very happy with our purchase.

name: Mr Peter S
discription: George attends to all my photographic inquiries so well. I have been a Michaels Camera purchaser for 30 years and still say that the service is better than ever. Thank you.

name: Mr Graeme P
discription: With my transactions this afternoon I could not find any areas for improvement but I was impressed with your Valuable Extras Vouchers. Good for customer retention. Paul, your Sales Consultant, was very helpful. Could you pass this on please.
